description: I think Venus may have found her calling in life when it comes to beating up men! Nick is a fairly non-responsive sub that deserves nothing more than to be spat on, flogged, fucked in the face and ass and have his balls pulled. Venus puts him through his paces until she becomes bored with the pathetic site of him. He is left on the cold floor to think about the punishment he just endured.
title: Nick Nite and Venus
